description: Sergei Torop, who has thousands of followers, is arrested over causing harm to them and money extortion.
title: Sergei Torop: Russian religious sect leader arrested over allegations of harm
title_page: Sergei Torop: Russian religious sect leader arrested over allegations of harm - BBC News
maintext: Followers of the Church of the Last Testament founded a settlement, known as the City of the Sun, in the Kuraga region of Siberia in 1995. Several hundred members live in other settlements in the region.
